metadata.title: GNLink - We bring natural gas where it doesn't reach
metadata.description: We exist to bring natural gas where it doesn't reach. GNLink is a natural gas distributor from the Lorinvest asset manager.

hero.title: We bring natural gas where it doesn't reach
hero.subtitle: We are a key player in the energy transition of Brazil and the world

aboutSection.title: About Us
aboutSection.description: GNLink is a natural gas distributor from the Lorinvest asset manager, which develops innovative, scalable projects committed to sustainable principles since 1953.

whatWeDoSection.title: What We Do
whatWeDoSection.description: We develop customized and innovative solutions for liquefaction, transportation, cabotage, storage and regasification of liquefied natural gas.

cabotage.title: Cabotage
cabotage.description: Maritime LNG transport along the Brazilian coast

storage.title: Storage
storage.description: Safe and strategic natural gas storage

regasification.title: Regasification
regasification.description: LNG conversion for industrial and commercial use

items.competitiveness: We contribute to competitiveness and greater operational and environmental efficiency in the sector.
items.expansion: We facilitate business expansion between companies and natural gas distributors.
items.innovation: We offer innovative business models through the interiorization of natural gas in Brazilian states.

applicationsSection.title: LNG Applications
applicationsSection.description: The energy transition is one of the main global needs, and natural gas plays a fundamental role in this process

interiorization.title: Gas Interiorization
interiorization.description: We bring natural gas to regions not served by pipelines, promoting regional development.

transition.title: Energy Transition
transition.description: Natural gas is key in decarbonization, with lower environmental impact than traditional fuels.

esg.title: ESG
esg.description: Commitment to sustainable practices, social responsibility and corporate governance.

hydrogen.title: Green Hydrogen (H2V)
hydrogen.description: We invest in the future with green hydrogen projects for a clean energy matrix.

projectsSection.title: Our Projects
projectsSection.description: Discover the projects that are transforming Brazil's energy landscape

newsSection.title: Latest News
newsSection.description: Stay up to date with GNLink news

ctaSection.title: Be Part of the Energy Transition
ctaSection.description: Contact us and discover how we can collaborate for a more sustainable future

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: We exist to bring natural gas where it doesn't reach
about.description: GNLink is a natural gas distributor from the Lorinvest asset manager, which develops innovative, scalable projects committed to sustainable principles since 1953.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To operate in the liquid and gaseous gas segment with an energy transition focus, where gas still doesn't reach.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To provide access to competitive, safe and sustainable energy to our customers with replicable projects and fast implementation.

values.title: Our Values
values.ethics: We act with ethics, social responsibility and transparency.
values.teamwork: We build together, work with simplicity and are truthful.
values.excellence: We act with purpose and deliver results with excellence to shareholders.

gases.title: Our Gases
gases.description: Gases are key in the energy transition process, through multimodal distribution/logistics of:

context.title: The Brazilian Context
context.description: Brazil imports substitute fuels and gas pipeline infrastructure is very limited. GNLink works to change this scenario.

marcelo.name: Marcelo Rodrigues
marcelo.bio: Over 35 years of experience in Industrial, Medical and Hydrogen Gas markets, as well as natural gas, leading various businesses.

laila.name: Laila Helayel
laila.bio: Law graduate with 20 years of experience in corporate law, corporate governance, contracts and M&A.

silvino.name: Silvino Pinto
silvino.bio: Professional with over 30 years of experience in Business, Commercial, Customer Service and Market Development sectors.

cleber.name: Cleber Hamada
cleber.bio: Professional with over 15 years of experience in M&A, corporate strategy, new business development and innovation.

codeOfConduct.title: Code of Conduct
codeOfConduct.description: Our Code of Conduct establishes the principles and guidelines that guide the ethical behavior of all GNLink employees.

ethicsChannel.title: Ethics Channel
ethicsChannel.description: The Ethics Channel is a safe and confidential way to report situations that violate our Code of Conduct or current legislation.

commitment.title: Commitment to Integrity
commitment.description: We act with ethics, social responsibility and transparency. We build together, work with simplicity and are truthful. We act with purpose and deliver results with excellence.

careers.title: Work With Us
careers.subtitle: Join the team that is transforming the energy sector in Brazil
careers.description: At GNLink, we value professionals committed to innovation and sustainability. Come be part of our team!
